title: New Arrival
description: Register a new citizen in the database using INSERT INTO statement.
story: A new resident just moved to the city! Add their information to the citizens database: Emma Wilson, age 26, living in Downtown district.
hint: Use INSERT INTO citizens (name, age, district) VALUES (...) to add new records.
tableSetup: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS citizens CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE citizens (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100), age INT, district VARCHAR(50));
INSERT INTO citizens (name, age, district) VALUES ('Alice Johnson', 28, 'Downtown'), ('Bob Smith', 35, 'Uptown');
